long_description: The Green Mountain State is a classic hiking destination--this edition is completely revised and updated. Author: Green Mountain Club. Softcover; 240 pages; black-and-white photographs and topo maps. Backcountry Guides; copyright 2003; 6th edition. Hikes range in length from a half-mile stroll to a 22-mile backpacking trip. Each hike destination includes a topographic map, mile-by-mile directions and information on distance, difficulty, terrain and hiking time. Overview chart makes it easy to pick a hike at a glance.
short_description: The Green Mountain State is a classic hiking destination--this edition is completely revised and updated.
